SPtools 0.9.1
  • Get started
  • Reference

    SPtools: Tools for data visualization

    The SPtools package provides a set of utilities for High Throughput Sequence Data Visualization. This package is designed to extend and provide a visualization and utilities interface for the systemPipeR package.

    Installation

    if (!requireNamespace("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE)) {
  install.packages("BiocManager") }
BiocManager::install("systemPipeR/SPtools"")
